asset.author: Everlast
asset.hookText: Andre Dirrell chooses the Everlast 1910 Fight Glove for his upcoming bout vs. Arthur Abraham.  Round two of the Super 6 Super Middleweight Tournament kicks off this Saturday March 27th at 10:30PM EST on Showtime.  Free Showtime preview all weekend long, tune in and check us out!
